JOINT-2-
As you are my wife, I do hereby, out of love and affection for you, for the comfort of your future life and for the purpose of providing you with a home, the land as per the 3rd Schedule below, vested in me as my inheritance and free from any encumbrances, liens, etc., on the land which is in my right and possession. Having removed all the obstacles and believing that all the land I have is not free from any compensation, I hereby transfer the Scheduled Land to you free of charge by virtue of this Gift Deed and immediately transfer it to your possession. Therefore, you shall register the Scheduled Land in your name in the records of the Panchayat and other authorities as the sole owner and pay all the taxes yourself. You shall construct the structures and other structures as you wish and use them and enjoy them with all the rights and freedoms of your children, grandchildren, descendants, and great-grandchildren by means of donation, sale, and other means. Therefore, I, my heirs, my descendants, you, your descendants, or your descendants, will never be a donor of any kind of obstruction, objection, or dispute. The Scheduled Property is not Government Property, and is not a property within the boundaries of the Waks Board Endowments, and is an undisputed property, free from any mortgages, suits, decrees, court seizures, inheritance rights, manovarti charges, commercial charges, etc., and I hereby give this gift deed in your name with full confidence. "RayuSheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 254 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Vanjarapu Ramu in favour of his wife, Vanjarapu Kumari, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 73.88 Sq. Yds., located nearby house number 3-70, comprised in survey number 26/1, situated in LakkuPuram Village, Palavalasa Grama Panchayath, Burja Mandal, erstwhile Srikakulam now within the District of Parvathipuiram Manyam, registered at sub-registrar office Palakonda(108), is bounded as follow North by: Panchayati CC Road South by: Panchayati CC Road East by: RCC House of Chinni Ramesh West by: RCC House of Chinni Chinnammadu
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
